Flexible Staffing Solutions for Your Business

Access pre-screened workers, streamline your hiring process, and reduce administrative burden with our comprehensive staffing services.

How Our Process Works

Our streamlined process connects you with qualified workers quickly and efficiently

1

Create Your Account

Register with your company details and set up secure login credentials. This takes approximately 5 minutes.

2

Specify Your Needs

Detail your staffing requirements including number of workers, skills needed, work location, and timeline.

3

Account Verification

Our team reviews your company information within 24 hours to verify your business details.

4

Access Worker Profiles

Browse through our database of pre-screened candidates that match your requirements.

5

Generate Agreements

Select workers and generate digital agreements directly through our platform.

6

Finalize Hiring

Once agreements are signed, you'll receive confirmation and contact details for your new workers.

Benefits for Employers

⚡

Rapid Staffing

Access to pre-screened workers within 72 hours, significantly faster than traditional recruitment.

📊

Flexible Solutions

Scale your workforce up or down based on business needs without long-term commitments.

⚖️

Compliance Assured

All contracts and agreements comply with Dutch and EU regulations, minimizing legal risks.

📝

Administrative Efficiency

We handle payroll, taxes, and employment paperwork, reducing your administrative burden.

🌍

Multilingual Support

Communication in 5 languages for international businesses and diverse workforces.

✓

Quality Guarantee

All workers are vetted and skills-verified, with a replacement guarantee if they don't meet expectations.

Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly can we get workers after signing up?

After account verification, you can immediately access worker profiles. Once agreements are signed, workers can typically start within 24-72 hours.

What types of agreements do you offer?

We offer temporary staffing agreements, direct placement contracts, and payrolling services, all customizable to your specific needs.

How are workers vetted before appearing in the database?

All workers undergo identity verification, skills assessment, reference checks, and right-to-work verification before being added to our database.

What happens if a worker doesn't meet our expectations?

We offer a replacement guarantee. If a worker doesn't meet your requirements within the first week, we'll replace them at no additional cost.

How are the agreements legally binding?

Our digital agreements use secure electronic signature technology that complies with eIDAS regulations, making them legally binding in all EU countries.

What administrative responsibilities do we have as the employer?

Minimal. We handle payroll, taxes, insurance, and compliance requirements. You're responsible only for day-to-day management and providing a safe work environment.

Ready to Transform Your Workforce Strategy?

Register today to access our pool of qualified workers and streamline your hiring process.
